title: Inspection Request - Foundation
content:
GOVERNMENT OF [STATE/INDIA]

DEPARTMENT OF [DEPARTMENT NAME]

To,
John Doe
Junior Engineer
Test Department

Date: 14-12-2025

Subject: Call for Inspection of Foundation for Work Order No. WO-001

Sir/Madam,

This is to inform you that the Foundation stage for the work "Construction of Boundary Wall" has been reported as completed by the contractor.

You are requested to inspect the site/materials on 31-12-2025 and verify the quality and quantity as per the specifications laid down in the agreement.

Kindly submit your inspection report at the earliest so that the subsequent billing process can be initiated.

Yours faithfully,



Test Admin
Administrator
